Articles.Content:
Just wondering who else has heard of / following this games development? Seems pretty tiny at the moment but the very small amount of gameplay looks interesting

Small devs always seem to come up with the coolest ideas

*Stumbles across thread completely naturally and totally not because I was Googling "Eden Star"*

Oh hello! It so happens that I'm one of the Devs on Eden Star! Cheers for your interest!

Keep an eye on our site (http://www.edenstargame.com/) because we might possibly maybe have a playable demo out soon

Cheers, Jenkens!
